content: Have you got a gap analysis of the formalisms?

I think that we have more things
- discriminators
- robust terminology mappings
- more solid invariant method
I know there's things we don't have, partly because we studiously avoid inheritence from concrete classes
Not yet - link to a formal definition of 'profiling'? I'd like to properly review each of those items on the list. I know how ADL does them, but I'm unclear on the formal definition in FHIR.
